title: Monster Mash-Up (206.X, beta)
description:
Compilation mod pack for the {{Y|Caves of Qud Modding Jam: Monster Mash}}, ran at the end of October 2023. See all the entries at {{C|https://itch.io/jam/caves-of-qud-modding-jam-1/entries}}!

Wish for 'mashup' or press ctrl-shift-W (Monster Mash-Up Wish Menu, beta only!) to open a menu for easy wishing for the pack's contents.

{{W|Warning:}} Do not run this pack simultaneous with any of the mods contained within.
author: Mod Jam Participants and Organizers
